title: Flight delay reasons
description: Data about why flights are delayed when getting

year.description: The year in which the delay happened

airport_name.description: The airport name in which the delay happened

arr_flights.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified

arr_del15.description: The number arriving flight which were late by 15 minutes on the month specified

carrier_ct.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to carrier delays

weather_ct.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to weather delays

nas_ct.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to NAS delays

security_ct.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to security delays

late_aircraft_ct.description: The number of arriving flights on the month specified which were late due to late aircraft arrival delays

arr_cancelled.description: The total number of flights cancelled

arr_diverted.description: The total number of flights diverted
